about_the_game:
Finally, the popular game has entered its final chapter!

Noel the Mortal Fate is the tale of Noel, a girl who has lost her limbs, and Caron, the devil who took them, as they embark together on an action-packed journey for revenge. Take control of Noel, Caron and their allies to explore the game's locales, fight off their enemies, and complete other missions to progress through the story.

The newly released Steam version of "Noel the Mortal Fate S12" is also available in Japanese, English, and Simplified Chinese.
The story of the two characters, Caron and Burrows, who have a history with each other, finally comes to a "resolution".

Noel and Caron's next objective is to obtain information on the "Demon of the Beginning," which is deeply involved in Burrows' ambitions.
Use your knowledge and experience to guide Caron's thinking in the right direction in "deduction missions" or fight with the support of your friends with special abilities to uncover the "truth"!

Season12
Noel finally ran out of strength and collapsed.
Hugo and his team were stunned by the confession of Caron about the mighty Noel's "price".
Meanwhile, Burrows suddenly held a press conference in Laplace and declared a "run-off election."
His overly mysterious actions plunged them into a state of suspicion and uncertainty.

However, the next mission for everyone is to infiltrate the Sant'Angelo Public University, where OCT is stationed.
They aim to break into the heart of the enemy and obtain information on the "Devil of the Beginning," who is deeply involved in Burrows' ambitions.

Amidst the whirlwind of their respective agendas, can Calon and his team uncover the true identity of the "Devil of the Beginning"?
